original_text: Ashdod, its surrounding settlements and villages; and Gaza, its settlements and villages, as far as the Wadi of Egypt and the coastline of the Mediterranean Sea.
korean_text: 아스돗과 그 촌락들과 그 마을들과 가사와 그 촌락들과 그 마을들이니 애굽 시내와 대해의 경계에까지 이르렀으며

sentences.original_text: Ashdod, its surrounding settlements and villages;
and Gaza, its settlements and villages,
as far as the Wadi of Egypt
and the coastline of the Mediterranean Sea.
